title: Prophet

fields.name: Abiliites:
fields.value:
- Preach to a player; they become a random town role with conversion immunity(1 night cooldown)
- Declare a crusade on a target, preventing them from being visited for the next 2 nights.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may not be lynched D1, D2, or D3. However, it will appear as though you can.
- If this role rolls, all but one town / good slots are replaced with random REF roles.
- All REF roles have the win condition to "Take down the town and unite the evils."
- Evils are uninformed, town is informed
- You may not die during the night.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Lynch and execute all evildoers and criminals.

desc:
Post 4200
*This town has been overrun by vile demons and monsters, we must unite and push them back.*
